mdRecord.dcterms:description: This appears to be a preliminary draft of a document complaining about the management of the Lylburn Downing School in Lexington, Virginia during the school year ending in 1937. The handwritten document is on letterhead stationery from Walker and Wood Brothers business.
Parts of this document have been redacted.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Draft on Condition of Lylburn Downing School, November 22, 1937
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African Americans -- Education
African American schools
African American teachers
Lylburn Downing School (Lexington, Va.)
